content.question: In sentence 9, the writer wants to make a claim that rebuts the claim made in sentence 8 and that sets up the rest of the paragraph. Which of the following versions of sentence 9 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: However, banana growers essentially have no control over what they plant.
